assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox rendering renders nothing when currentIndex is null
assertionResults.title: renders nothing when currentIndex is null

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox rendering renders nothing when currentIndex is out of range
assertionResults.title: renders nothing when currentIndex is out of range

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox rendering renders the dialog when currentIndex is valid
assertionResults.title: renders the dialog when currentIndex is valid

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox rendering renders the correct image
assertionResults.title: renders the correct image

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox rendering shows image counter for multi-image galleries
assertionResults.title: shows image counter for multi-image galleries

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox rendering shows "Image preview" for single-image galleries
assertionResults.title: shows "Image preview" for single-image galleries

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox rendering shows navigation buttons for multi-image galleries
assertionResults.title: shows navigation buttons for multi-image galleries

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox rendering hides navigation buttons for single-image galleries
assertionResults.title: hides navigation buttons for single-image galleries

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox navigation calls onNavigate with next index on Next click
assertionResults.title: calls onNavigate with next index on Next click

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox navigation calls onNavigate with previous index on Prev click
assertionResults.title: calls onNavigate with previous index on Prev click

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox navigation wraps forward from last image to first
assertionResults.title: wraps forward from last image to first

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox navigation wraps backward from first image to last
assertionResults.title: wraps backward from first image to last

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox close behavior calls onClose when close button is clicked
assertionResults.title: calls onClose when close button is clicked

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox close behavior calls onClose when backdrop is clicked
assertionResults.title: calls onClose when backdrop is clicked

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox keyboard navigation calls onClose on Escape key
assertionResults.title: calls onClose on Escape key

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox keyboard navigation calls onNavigate on ArrowRight
assertionResults.title: calls onNavigate on ArrowRight

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox keyboard navigation calls onNavigate on ArrowLeft
assertionResults.title: calls onNavigate on ArrowLeft

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox scroll lock preservation sets body overflow to hidden when open
assertionResults.title: sets body overflow to hidden when open

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox scroll lock preservation restores previous overflow value on unmount
assertionResults.title: restores previous overflow value on unmount

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox scroll lock preservation restores empty overflow when no prior lock existed
assertionResults.title: restores empty overflow when no prior lock existed

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox accessibility has role="dialog" and aria-modal="true"
assertionResults.title: has role="dialog" and aria-modal="true"

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox accessibility uses provided alt text on the image
assertionResults.title: uses provided alt text on the image

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox focus management moves focus into lightbox when opened
assertionResults.title: moves focus into lightbox when opened

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox focus management restores focus to previously active element when closed
assertionResults.title: restores focus to previously active element when closed

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox focus management traps Tab key when focus is on the container itself
assertionResults.title: traps Tab key when focus is on the container itself

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox focus management traps Shift+Tab when focus is on the container itself
assertionResults.title: traps Shift+Tab when focus is on the container itself

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox focus management cycles focus forward with Tab from last focusable element
assertionResults.title: cycles focus forward with Tab from last focusable element

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox focus management cycles focus backward with Shift+Tab from first focusable element
assertionResults.title: cycles focus backward with Shift+Tab from first focusable element

assertionResults.fullName: ImageLightbox focus management does not trap Tab when no focusable elements exist
assertionResults.title: does not trap Tab when no focusable elements exist
